price: 64. Maye manso mazali о likolo тре na nsé mazali ya ye. Mpe ya sólo Allah azali mozwi mpe akoka na lokumu.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
